mutants.code:
class Node:

    def __init__(self, data):
        self.left = None
        self.right = None
        self.data = data

def construct_binary_tree(nodes):

    def binary_tree(nodes, root, i, n):
        if i <= n:
            temp = Node(nodes[i])
            root = temp
            root.left = binary_tree(nodes, root.left, 2 * i + 1, n)
            root.right = binary_tree(nodes, root.right, 2 * i + 2, n)
        return root

    def in_order(node):
        if node is not None:
            in_order(node.left)
            nonlocal deepest_node
            deepest_node = node.data
            in_order(node.right)
    root = None
    last_index = len(nodes)
    deepest_node = None
    root = binary_tree(nodes, root, 0, last_index)
    in_order(root)
    return deepest_node

            root = temp
            root.left = binary_tree(nodes, root.left, -2 * i + 1, n)
            root.right = binary_tree(nodes, root.right, 2 * i + 2, n)
        return root

    def in_order(node):
        if node is not None:
            in_order(node.left)
            nonlocal deepest_node
            deepest_node = node.data
            in_order(node.right)
    root = None
    last_index = len(nodes)
    deepest_node = None
    root = binary_tree(nodes, root, 0, last_index)
    in_order(root)
    return deepest_node

        self.left = None
        self.right = None

def construct_binary_tree(nodes):

    def binary_tree(nodes, root, i, n):
        if i < n:
            temp = Node(nodes[i])

            root.right = binary_tree(nodes, root.right, 3 * i + 2, n)

    def in_order(node):
        if node is not None:

            nonlocal deepest_node

    root = None

    root = binary_tree(nodes, root, 0, last_index)
    in_order(root)

    def __init__(self, data):
        self.left = None
        self.right = None
        self.data = data

def construct_binary_tree(nodes):

    def binary_tree(nodes, root, i, n):
        if i < n:
            temp = Node(nodes[i])
            root = temp
            root.left = binary_tree(nodes, root.left, 2 * i + 1, n)
            root.right = binary_tree(nodes, root.right, -2 * i + 2, n)
        return root

    def in_order(node):
        if node is not None:
            in_order(node.left)
            nonlocal deepest_node
            deepest_node = node.data
            in_order(node.right)
    root = None
    last_index = len(nodes)
    deepest_node = None
    root = binary_tree(nodes, root, 0, last_index)
    in_order(root)
    return deepest_node
